properties.entry: SELECT OR_NO , OR_DATE , P_NAME , ENROLL_DATE FROM "ORDER" JOIN OR_PRODUCT USING (OR_NO) JOIN PRODUCT USING (P_CODE) WHERE MEM_NO = ? ORDER BY OR_NO DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT O.MEM_NO , O.OR_NO , P.P_NAME , ORP.OR_AMOUNT , O.OR_DATE , O.OR_PRICE , O.PARCEL_NAME , O.PARCEL_NUM , O.PARCEL_STATUS FROM "ORDER" O JOIN OR_PRODUCT ORP ON (O.OR_NO = ORP.OR_NO) JOIN PRODUCT P ON (ORP.P_CODE = P.P_CODE) ORDER BY O.OR_DATE DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
